plot: Lisbon and its accessibility, in the crossroads of a swift change in the pace of means of transport, from narrow rural paths to large streets and roads for motor vehicles.
title: Lisboa e os Problemas do Seu Acesso

original_name: Lisboa e os Problemas do Seu Acesso
